item.description:
As you may know there is a big push for contributions on Dec 16th in honor of the Boston Tea Party. But with the NH primary on Jan 8th, money that comes in then likely can't be spent on NH. So the campaign is asking for donations earlier. The Boston Tea Party folks have suggested that folks try to donate on Nov 30th in addition to the Tea Party, or instead of - your decision. This is to send a message for Rudy to take a look at the reading List Dr Paul gave him. You can see what it's all about and sign up at
http://www.RudysReadi...
Then RSVP here.

If you want to say thanks to the good folks in NY for all their help canvassing NH, enter AVERYK in the Project code when you donate.
item.name: HUGE Donation Day - for Rudy
